DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to test the non-inferiority of the experimental arm compared to the standard arm in terms of Progression free survival (PFS).
DOC.brief_title: HD16 for Early Stage Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Hodgkin Lymphoma CS I, II without risk factors large mediastinal mass (> 1/3 of maximum transverse thorax diameter) extranodal involvement elevated ESR 3 or more involved nodal areas Written informed consent Leucocytes < 3000/µl Platelets < 100000/µl Hodgkin Lymphoma as composite lymphoma Activity index (WHO) > 2
